content: मृद् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (मृद्गति, मृदित) {@--1@} To squeeze, press, rub: मम च मृदितं क्षौमं बाल्ये त्वदंगविवर्तनैः <ls>Ve. 5. 40.</ls> {@--2@} To trample or tread upon; crush, dash to pieces, kill, destroy, pound bruise, pulverize; तावमदर्दिखादीच्च <ls>Bk. 15. 15</ls>; बलान्यमृद्गान्नलिनाभवक्त्रः <ls>R. 18. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To rub, stroke, rub against, touch; <ls>Śi. 4. 61.</ls> {@--4@} To overcome, surpass. {@--5@} To wipe away, rub off, remove. {@--6@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) To pass through (as a constellation). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मर्दयति) = मृद् <ab>q. v.</ab> above.

मृद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [मृद्यते मृद् कर्मणि क्विप्] {@--1@} Clay, earth, loam; अमीदं कुमुमभवं मदेव धत्ते मृद्गंधं न हि कुसुमा नि धारयंति . <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; प्रभवति शुचिर्बिंबोद्ग्राहे मणिर्न मृदां चयः <ls>U. 2. 4.</ls> {@--2@} A piece of earth, lump of clay. {@--3@} A mound of earth. {@--4@} A kind of fragrant earth.
